placesToVisit.name: El Faro de Rincon
placesToVisit.description: The iconic Rincon Lighthouse offers panoramic views of the ocean, ideal for whale watching and sunset views.

placesToVisit.name: Marias Beach
placesToVisit.description: A popular destination for surfers and beach lovers, known for its beautiful sunsets and laid-back atmosphere.

placesToVisit.name: Sandy Beach
placesToVisit.description: A favorite among locals and tourists for its golden sands, clear waters, and vibrant nightlife.

restaurants.name: Tamboo
restaurants.description: Seaside dining offering a mix of local and international cuisine, with stunning views of the ocean.

restaurants.name: The Beach House
restaurants.description: A relaxed atmosphere with an emphasis on fresh, local seafood, perfect for a casual meal by the water. It's the perfect spot to watch the sunset, and it also features live music on Sundays around sunset time.

restaurants.name: The English Rose
restaurants.description: Nestled in the hills of Rincon, offering a unique breakfast and brunch menu with breathtaking views.

placesToVisit.name: Playa Sucia
placesToVisit.description: Offering breathtaking views, crystal-clear waters, and plenty of wilderness to explore, this beach is part of the town’s nature reserve. Just steps away from Los Morrillos Lighthouse.

placesToVisit.name: Playa Buyé
placesToVisit.description: Playa Buyé offers tranquil, clear waters and pristine white sands, ideal for relaxation and snorkeling.

placesToVisit.name: Boqueron Beach
placesToVisit.description: A bustling beach town famous for its wide, family-friendly beach, vibrant community, and delicious street food.

restaurants.name: Buena Vibra Bar & Tapas
restaurants.description: Offers a lively setting with creative local and international tapas, perfect for enjoying crafted cocktails and vibrant ambiance

restaurants.name: El Mercado Boqueron
restaurants.description: It's an open, relaxed atmosphere with tapas, cocktails, and main dishes including fresh fish.

restaurants.name: Bamboleio
restaurants.description: Local, very fresh, creative seafood, and puertorrican favorites specialties. Panoramic sea view and artisan bar.
